title: Smart Data Models - PssELIN2
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Power system stabilizer typically associated with ExcELIN2 (though PssIEEE2B or Pss2B can also be used).

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PssELIN2

apss.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient (a_PSS).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

ks1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain (Ks1).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

ks2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain (Ks2).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

ppss.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient (p_PSS) (>=0 and <=4).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

psslim.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PSS limiter (psslim).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

ts1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (Ts1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

ts2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (Ts2).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

ts3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (Ts3).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

ts4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (Ts4).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

ts5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (Ts5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

ts6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (Ts6).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0
